to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: a partial hd resolution
body:
Hello all,
I just bought a USB enclosure, and was wondering, if there is a way to retrieve my files from an ext3 system through windows, or something else.
